name: Apothecary, Inc.
description: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.
one_liner: Operator of a skincare marketplace intended to empower the skincare journey. The company's marketplace provides recommendations, trail sampling, and connects for advice from skin influencers, aestheticians, and dermatologists, enabling customers to have a constant guide for their skincare regime.

name: Blue Wire, Inc.
description: Developer of a sports podcasting platform intended to bring together a new generation of creators to create audio content. The company's network is made up of journalists, former athletes, and influential fans, building sports podcasting channels on various sports leagues and college football and soccer markets, enabling users to get updates about the sports.
one_liner: Developer of a sports podcasting platform intended to bring together a new generation of creators to create audio content. The company's network is made up of journalists, former athletes, and influential fans, building sports podcasting channels on various sports leagues and college football and soccer markets, enabling users to get updates about the sports.

name: INGENIOTECA, S.A.P.I. DE C.V.
description: Developer of a reward platform designed to provide real rewards for website and app usage. The company's platform features a user retention and customer satisfaction toolset for website and app developers and an incentivized ad network, enabling publishers to monetize their apps and websites through moments or actions of their users increasing engagement and interest.
one_liner: Developer of a reward platform designed to provide real rewards for website and app usage. The company's platform features a user retention and customer satisfaction toolset for website and app developers and an incentivized ad network, enabling publishers to monetize their apps and websites through moments or actions of their users increasing engagement and interest.

name: Clout Technologies Inc.
description: Global infrastructure for the next generation of content-driven, creator-led marketing.
one_liner: Global infrastructure for the next generation of content-driven, creator-led marketing.

name: FasTest Neuro Solutions Inc.
description: Provider of web service intended to increase the speed of marketing research. The company utilizes artificial intelligence which analyzes consumer brain reactions and makes marketing research fast, fully automated, and remoted, enabling brands to test and spot Ad creatives with the highest commercial potential.
one_liner: Provider of web service intended to increase the speed of marketing research. The company utilizes artificial intelligence which analyzes consumer brain reactions and makes marketing research fast, fully automated, and remoted, enabling brands to test and spot Ad creatives with the highest commercial potential.

name: Keepface Global, Inc.
description: Developer of an influencer marketing platform designed to help brands collaborate with influencers to boost marketing return on investment in emerging markets. The company's platform facilitates brands to reach out to the most relevant influencers, communicate with them and manage campaigns using real-time analytics, enabling businesses and organizations to influence the minds of targeted prospects using top opinion leaders.
one_liner: Developer of an influencer marketing platform designed to help brands collaborate with influencers to boost marketing return on investment in emerging markets. The company's platform facilitates brands to reach out to the most relevant influencers, communicate with them and manage campaigns using real-time analytics, enabling businesses and organizations to influence the minds of targeted prospects using top opinion leaders.

name: Miso Technologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a search and recommendation tool designed to solve problems related to science, technology, product research, and development. The company's tool helps to learn the researcher's interests in a responsive real-time manner and delivers them a contextual feed of the research papers, news articles, blog posts, and open-source, enabling businesses to save time and avoid blind spots that would otherwise be costly to their work.
one_liner: Developer of a search and recommendation tool designed to solve problems related to science, technology, product research, and development. The company's tool helps to learn the researcher's interests in a responsive real-time manner and delivers them a contextual feed of the research papers, news articles, blog posts, and open-source, enabling businesses to save time and avoid blind spots that would otherwise be costly to their work.

name: Malivar, Inc.
description: Developer of artificial intelligence-powered tools designed for businesses and creators. The company's platform alters videos in seconds using text prompts, enabling users to create artificial intelligence-powered videos.
one_liner: Developer of artificial intelligence-powered tools designed for businesses and creators. The company's platform alters videos in seconds using text prompts, enabling users to create artificial intelligence-powered videos.

name: Pinoffer Inc.
description: Developer of location-based ad and analytics platform designed to increase physical stores sales. The company's platform offers offline store customer retention, growth and churn rates, cashback return on investment, time analysis, enabling offline retailers to understand their customer's in-out of store behavior.
one_liner: Developer of location-based ad and analytics platform designed to increase physical stores sales. The company's platform offers offline store customer retention, growth and churn rates, cashback return on investment, time analysis, enabling offline retailers to understand their customer's in-out of store behavior.

name: 72Lux Inc.
description: Developer of a distributed shopping platform intended to reduce the marketing budget. The company's platform revolutionizes affiliate marketing, integrates shopping experiences into paid search, display and social media and turnkey embeddable commerce options are available for websites, allows maximum flexibility on desktop and mobile, and holds multiple patents for universal checkout, enabling advertisers, retailers and publishers to create shoppable sites, content, advertisements, mobile applications and other commerce experiences.
one_liner: Developer of a distributed shopping platform intended to reduce the marketing budget. The company's platform revolutionizes affiliate marketing, integrates shopping experiences into paid search, display and social media and turnkey embeddable commerce options are available for websites, allows maximum flexibility on desktop and mobile, and holds multiple patents for universal checkout, enabling advertisers, retailers and publishers to create shoppable sites, content, advertisements, mobile applications and other commerce experiences.

name: SilverPush Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of an advertising platform intended to offer data-driven technologies to complex client problems. The company's platform focuses on developing proprietary metrics around advanced computer vision capabilities that can be applied to new use cases in the media industry, enabling brands to discover their most relevant audience through context-relevant video ad placement targeting, in a fully controlled and brand-safe environment.
one_liner: Operator of an advertising platform intended to offer data-driven technologies to complex client problems. The company's platform focuses on developing proprietary metrics around advanced computer vision capabilities that can be applied to new use cases in the media industry, enabling brands to discover their most relevant audience through context-relevant video ad placement targeting, in a fully controlled and brand-safe environment.

name: Sweply Holding Limited
description: Sweply makes it simple to create, manage and analyze digital marketing campaigns on multiple platforms from one place.
one_liner: Sweply makes it simple to create, manage and analyze digital marketing campaigns on multiple platforms from one place.

name: The News Lens Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of digital advertising, data analytics, and media platforms intended to provide original and current media content to the Asian market. The company platform provides inclusive, in-depth, diverse, and highly influential content for digital readers, it grasps user information through zero-party, first-party, and third-party databases, AI analysis, Martech, and other cross-domain core products, enabling users to get suitable reading content and to easily share, discuss and participate in topics they are interested in.

The company platform provides inclusive, in-depth, diverse, and highly influential content for digital readers, it grasps user information through zero-party, first-party, and third-party databases, AI analysis, Martech, and other cross-domain core products, enabling users to get suitable reading content and to easily share, discuss and participate in topics they are interested in.
